info.name: Fx3: "Qute 3 for Firefox 3 mod" modifier
info.description:
The style modify the theme that's named "Qute 3 for Firefox 3 mod" to better on Fx3.
Before install the style, you have to install these two things:

1. Tab Mix Plus  0.3.6.1.080323( http://tmp.garyr.net/dev-builds/ )
2. Tab Progressbar with system appearance ( http://userstyles.org/styles/3842 )
